title: Why does my alarm go off too early or too late?
answer:
You may have enabled smart alarm. 

 If you have enabled the smart alarm feature, your TalkBand B2 will vibrate earlier than scheduled if it detects that you are in a state of light sleep. 

 If you fail to promptly cancel the alarm using the side button when your TalkBand B2 vibrates, your TalkBand B2 will snooze for ten minutes before vibrating again. This may be repeated a maximum of three times.
